website_summaries.verdict: Many repeat customers call this top-selling product their "go-to" concealer, thanks to the excellent coverage, creamy consistency, and long wear it offers.
pros: A lightweight, vegan formula that doesn't tend to crease
Produces a radiant finish that highlights and defines
Has a creamy consistency that moisturizes the skin
cons: Sets somewhat quickly, so you must blend it promptly for the best results

website_summaries.verdict: A full-coverage concealer with skin-nourishing ingredients that has earned a loyal fan base. Many repeat users say it's the best concealer they've ever used.
pros: The brand's top concealer is made with licorice root and shea and mango seed butter, which moisturize and brighten skin while delivering full coverage
Great for concealing dark circles and blemishes
Ideal for highlighting under the eyes
cons: Can be cakey if you use too much or don't blend it thoroughly
Some users find it too dry for under the eyes

customer_reviews.title: full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I am desperately trying to find a concealer that covers my dark under eye circles and hides the bags as well. This product does pretty well. It does settle in creases a little bit if you don't set it with a setting powder. Hard choosing colors online without seeing real thing, could have used a slightly darker shade, but liked it enough that will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: cdg

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I buy this at Ulta, but as soon as I saw it was available at Amazon I ordered it here instead. This is seriously the best concealer money can buy. It feels lightweight, but it has amazing coverage. It's buildable, too, in case one layer isn't enough. Covers acne, under eye circles, redness, uneven tone, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this concealer! It’s the only concealer I use because it has full coverage and it lasts throughout the day. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY
customer_reviews.text: BEST BEST BEST!!! I’m a Light tan color With pink and orange undertones and the 2nd lightest one works just great !! You just have to use LESS!!! if you use too much you’ll look like James Charles flashback marry. Except this product doesn’t have flashback. Hey sisters
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coverage. I use it on my eyelids before applying eye shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: This was a fake product! It was not a real Tarte product. Do not buy this! I would give this zero stars but it wouldn’t allow it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE TARTE MAKEUP. Amazing coverage. Thick and stays on all day
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its so amazing if you have a lighter skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Tom and Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING!!! that is all you need to know....totally worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product ! Moisturizing! And great coverage! I love Tarte !
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Surita

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a fake! It settled in my fine lines and made me look way worse!
customer_reviews.author: lau

customer_reviews.title: Blend
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite’ seals so well and easy to apply. Works best with finger to blend
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is legit! It is now my go-to! Light, not greasy and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great formula
customer_reviews.text: Great formula. I think I purchased a too light shade. Love the product regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy this because of the price but so worth it! A little goes a looong way and it lasts all day! Hurrah!
customer_reviews.author: Stan Wong

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite but might work for more oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a little cakey and the colors run lighter than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best concealer out there for full coverage. Extremely versatile and buildable.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t the wrong shade and shipping is way too much to send back
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t the wrong shade and shipping is way too much to send back

customer_reviews.title: Great and original
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted it for a long time and happy I got it here!

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: finally a cover up that works without sinking into my lines!

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is a super great product I just ordered the wrong color

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very very thick and heavily pigmented! Cannot use very large doe foot to apply!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Schwalbach

customer_reviews.title: This is a miracle 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughters got me hooked on this product. Great concealer like no other👊🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: GAME CHANGER. I don’t really have dark circles BUT, I’m 52 have beginnings I’d eye wrinkles and I’m telling you takes 10 years off. I was skeptical because of price but it’s a huge tube and you need VERY LITTLE! I’m a lifer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whole lotta hype for whole lotta nothin
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t know what all the hype is for this concealer. It cakes and creases with the tiniest amount. I do have dry skin, but I take good care to make sure it’s hydrated. Based on all the 5 star reviews I’ve read and bloggers I follow, I was naively expecting some kind of miracle product. It’s jusr hype. Don’t fall for it like I did.
customer_reviews.author: AnthonysMaMa

customer_reviews.title: Looking for good coverage? Right here
customer_reviews.text: Guys you have to try this concealer I mean yes honey i love tart cosmetics great product definitely recomend covers bags under eyes very well also long lasting
customer_reviews.author: Alexis eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Plz fix awful bottle design
customer_reviews.text: Love the concealer and foundation but FOR THE LOVE OF GOD fix the design flaw of the bottles!! Both the concealer and foundation do this! SO much product is wasted and it’s extremely messy inside my makeup bag! It’s too expensive to be wasted! Other than that... love, clearly. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Reilly

customer_reviews.title: AhhhhMazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is THE BEST!! I am 37, not perfect skin but this stuff really covers spots, ect.. very well. I get from QVC
customer_reviews.author: cmilo

product_meta.title: Tarte Double Duty Beauty Shape Tape Contour Concealer - Fair Neutral
product_meta.description:
Meet Tarte's iconic, ''can't live without'' concealer & discover why one is sold every 12 seconds*! Double Duty Beauty Shape Tape Contour Concealer is a vegan, super-blendable formula that instantly helps brighten, smooth & give the skin a firmer, more lifted look.
Benefits:Full coverage with flawless matte finishConceals all imperfections & doubles as a contour/highlight productCreamy, easy-to-blend formula won't flake or creaseNourishes with mango seed & shea buttersHelps illuminate skin for a lifted effectAlways formulated without:ParabensMineral OilPhthalatesTriclosanSodium Lauryl SulfateGlutenSkinvigorating Ingredients:Shea Butter: A natural skin emollient that helps retain skin elasticity and protects against degenerationMango Seed Butter: Vitamin-rich butter helps moisturize, condition and protect against free radical damageLicorice Root Extract: Brightens the appearance of dark circles & color corrects
